messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory] Re: Topknot
messages.msgSnippet: No offense taken, I was just trying to be a little bit more specific on the hairstyle since it seemed like there was some question as to which one i was
messages.messageBody:
No offense taken, I was just trying to be a little bit
more specific on the hairstyle since it seemed like
there was some question as to which one i was speaking
of.

So does anyone have an answer? I seriously tried
putting my hair up like that and every time I did it
just fell all over the place. No I need to put gobs
of baby oil in it or what?

messages.subject: Re: Topknot
messages.msgSnippet: Hey. I wasn t trying to be offensive, but the other post gave me a chuckle, and it was something that I personally had been wondering about for a while anyway.
messages.messageBody:
Hey.
I wasn't trying to be offensive, but the other post gave me a chuckle,
and it was something that I personally had been wondering about for a while
anyway. The "department... &c." was in reference to my own question, not
yours. Sorry for the misunderstanding and for offending you if I did. Please
accept my humble apologies.

Tim
